parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Sheet thickness

parameters.name: ReverseThickDir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the sheet thickness, false to not

parameters.name: FindBends
parameters.description: True to find pre-made bends and part thickness, false to not

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: Radius for the bends

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.description: Gap for all rips

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Relief type as defined by swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e

parameters.name: ReliefRatio
parameters.description: Relief ratio

parameters.name: OverlapType
parameters.description: Overlap type for all rips 1=Open butt 2=Overlap 3=Underlap

parameters.name: OverlapRatio
parameters.description: Overlap ratio for all rips

parameters.name: KeepBody
parameters.description: True to keep bodies, false to not
